document.full_text: texas and the yankees lost out on the free agent cliff lee, but the rangers still entered saturday's game in the bronx with a 2.50 e.r.a., the lowest in the majors.
document.title: on baseball: rangers move on and fire away without lee
lines_and_colors: texas and the yankees lost out on the free agent cliff lee, but the rangers still entered saturday's game in the bronx with a 2.50 e.r.a., the lowest in the majors.
